T02D3031:74a-0: @74a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3031:74a-1: tshogs kyi bdag po'i las 'dod pa'i don thams cad
T02D3031:74a-2: rab tu sbyin pa longs spyod bsgrub par 'dod pa'i
T02D3031:74a-3: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3031:74a-4: gnas khang yid dang mthun par mandal zlum po shin
T02D3031:74a-5: tu mnyam pa me long gi ngos lta bur byas
T02D3031:74a-6: te / kha dog sngon po khru do'i tshad tsam
T02D3031:74a-7: byas la de'i steng du par bu sngon po gtso
T02D3031:74a-8: bo'i yi ges 'khor ba nang du phyogs kyi bdag
T02D3031:74a-9: po'i snying po gser las bris pa dang /
T02D3031:74a-10: ras sngon po la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris
T02D3031:74a-11: la rab tu gnas pa byas la dar sna tshogs
T02D3031:74a-12: pas dril la de'i nang du gzhug go //
T02D3031:74a-13: spre'u'i snying gi nang du gser sa byung ma dang /
T02D3031:74a-14: rin po che rnyed tshad dang /
T02D3031:74a-15: sha sna rnyed tshad de mandal gyi steng du bzhag la /
T02D3031:74a-17: spre'u'i spu bsgril ba'i gzungs thag gdags /
T02D3031:74a-18: de'i steng du tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku mdog dang /
T02D3031:74a-20: bdag nyid rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du byas la gzungs thag bzung la /
T02D3031:74a-21: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3031:74a-22: aom ga sv'a h'a zhes stong stong gzhan gyis bar
T02D3031:74a-23: ma chod par bzlas shing tshogs bdag gis bdag nyid
T02D3031:74a-24: la longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin pa byin
T02D3031:74a-25: par bsam mo // yar ngo'i brgyad pa'am /
T02D3031:74a-26: yang na mar ngo'i brgyad pa la tshogs kyi bdag
T02D3031:74a-27: po'i gtor ma shin tu bzang po sha sna tshogs
T02D3031:74a-28: dang / mar dang khur ba dang /
T02D3031:74a-29: ro mchog sna tshogs dang ldan pas mchod cing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D3031:74a-30: gzhan gyis mthong du mi rung ngo //
T02D3031:74a-31: tshogs bdag gi sgrub pa dbul ba'i gter sbyin zhes bya ba /
